benchmark_details.name: PRGB Benchmark
benchmark_details.overview: A multi-level fine-grained benchmark for evaluating the information utilization capabilities of large language models (LLMs) within Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a nuanced understanding of LLMsâ€™ roles in RAG systems and assess their document utilization capabilities.

data.source: Constructed using triplets from Wikipedia with manual verification and synthesis using GPT-4 for diverse entity types and scenarios.

methodology.calculation: Based on whether keywords appear in the document, using logical operators for accuracy enhancements.
methodology.interpretation: High scores indicate better LLM performance in generating accurate answers based on given contexts.
